snippet: The border talks with South Korea this week will discuss arrangements for reunions where relatives separated by the Korean War would meet for the first time in six decades.
abstract: North Korea agrees to hold border talks with South Korea to discuss arranging reunions in which relatives separated by Korean War would meet for first time in six decades.
lead_paragraph: The border talks with South Korea this week will discuss arrangements for reunions where relatives separated by the Korean War would meet for the first time in six decades.

headline.main: North Korea Agrees to Talks on Reunions
headline.print_headline: North Korea Agrees to Talks on Reunions
